document.full_text: the daughter of a prominent bahraini activist says she is on hunger strike to protest the arrest of her father, husband and other relatives after martial law was declared to quell weeks of pro-democracy protests.
document.title: bahrain woman says on hunger strike over arrests
lines_and_colors: the daughter of a prominent bahraini activist says she is on hunger strike to protest the arrest of her father, husband and other relatives after martial law was declared to quell weeks of pro-democracy protests.
